PETA - Photo Widget Traveling in an unfamiliar town, new to the area, or just looking for a good place to eat? Use this simple search powered by HappyCow.net to locate vegetarian- and vegan-friendly restaurants, health food stores, bakeries, bed&breakfasts, hotels, and caterers, as well as vegan organizations, farmers markets, and more near you.
